packages.name: Channels DVR
packages.description: This driver works with Channels DVR clients. It allows remote control features such as On/Off, Pause, Resume, Stop, Play Channel, mute, etc...

packages.name: Weather Canada (OWM3.0-EC)
packages.description: Now using OW API 3.0 - Polls weather information from OpenWeatherMap 3.0 and Weather Environment Canada (Alert RSS Feed - https://weather.gc.ca/)
